item.description:
Hello amigos, regulars, and newcomers,
Come join us and we'll have fun playing a question game and eating tacos and burritos at Chipotle Mexican Grill in North Andover!
* Pertinent questions and multi-choice answers that you could impress friends and family with!
* You are NEVER singled out and are part of a team of four!
* Good chance for some laughs, meeting new people, a drink or two, and tasty food & appetizers!
* Wonderful Authentic Mexican Food!
The schedule is: at 7:00 we order our Mexican food and mingle. At about 7:30 - 7:45, we start playing a really fun new trivia game where we partner you with other team members.
It's a blast. Believe me.
We <> have reduced prices for food gift cards (ie., $12 for a $20 card and I will keep you posted on that.)
item.how_to_find_us: You will see the large trivia 'horse track' board
item.name: Thursday Night Group Trivia Series & Mexican Food!!
